item.title: Sheryl add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Investigation?" Isabelle laughed. "Now we're detectives? Maybe we should all have code names." "Good idea," said Jace. "I shall be Baron Hotschaft Von Hugenstein." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Sheryl add a quote by Cassandra Clare
